document_data.mainbody:
Imvoran was a Zhentarim mageling of the mid-14 century.
By , Imvoran had been in service to the Zhentarim for a dozen years. Late that year, while in Manshoons presence, he witnessed the spellfire-induced death of Drauthtar Inskirl, when the latter teleported to the High Lords throne room, fatally injured by Shandril Shessairs spellfire. That was the first time he saw fear in Manshoons face.
